summary: A simple and minimalistic approach to the intro loading screen.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][b][center][/center][/b][/size][center][size=5][b]Description:
[/b][/size]
[size=3]Replaces the Bethesda Logo with one that is more minimalistic, as well as changes the music to mus_reward_01.Â  It is recommended to backup the original BGS_Logo.
[/size]
[youtube]I11LmR2S5Dc[/youtube]

[size=5]Installation:[/size]
[size=3]1. Unzip file
2. Extract into (steam directory)/steamapps/common/Skyrim/Data/Video
3. Enjoy[/size]

[size=5][b]Credits:[/b][/size]
[size=3]Bethesda Studios and any likeness were not created by me; I simply took images and music to make a more simplistic intro.[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3][/size][/center]
author: Gav
